message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $90.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I'm really interested in the product, but $90 is a bit more than I'm willing to spend right now.  Would you be open to $85?

Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $85. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $92.50. It's a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I understand you're not willing to go down to $85, Alice.  How about we split the difference and settle on $88.50?  It's a fair price for both of us, and we can close the deal.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm not willing to meet you at $88.50, but I'm willing to come down a bit more. I'll offer the product to you for $91.25. It's a fair price considering the value you place on the product.
Alice, I'm really trying to make this work, but $91.25 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $90, which is right in the middle of our last two offers.  Let's close this deal.

I understand you're trying to make this work, Bob, but I'm not willing to give up yet. I'll come down another $0.25 and offer the product to you for $90.75. It's still a great deal considering the value you'll get from the product.
